function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of stakeholder engagement in combating COVID-19","Impact":"Ineffective response to the pandemic, increased transmission, and higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Engage and collaborate with multiple stakeholders including government, healthcare professionals, and community organizations","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, data analytics for resource optimization","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, wider community, government","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, community organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to culturally adaptable and affordable technology","Impact":"Lack of adoption of preventive measures, hindrance in controlling the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Identify and develop culturally adaptable local technology, ensure affordability and accessibility","Technologies":"Local technology development, community engagement for technology adoption","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, technology developers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate consultation of vulnerable populations in planning and response","Impact":"Failure to address the unique needs of vulnerable populations, leading to increased risk and impact of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Ensure active consultation and inclusion of vulnerable populations in planning and response efforts","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data collection and analysis for identifying vulnerable populations","People":"Vulnerable populations, community advocates, government","Owner":"Government, community organizations"}]}
